synopsis.text: Galar's thriving culture revolves around the thrill of Pokémon battles in the captivating anime series, Pokémon: Twilight Wings. Separate from the main Pokémon series, this seven-episode capsule collection unveils the aspirations, struggles, and triumphs of the region's inhabitants. Delve into the daily lives of various characters from the popular video game "Pokémon: Sword and Shield" as they face adversity, conquer obstacles, and resolve disputes. Prepare to encounter an array of Pokémon native to the Galar region, making this series a must-watch for fans seeking a fresh and engaging perspective on the cherished franchise.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
